title: 21_Savage_Bank_Account_8
lyrics:
Ranking has ended, so this page is no longer in use. To keep track of the finalized lists and the rest of the EOY process, check for updates in the Year End List Timeline 2017 thread.
This is the ranking page for the 2017 Year End Lists. The initial ordering for albums and songs is based on the results of a Google form voting process—click here to learn more. Please do not edit the lyrics of this page. If you would like something changed, discuss it in the suggestions or message @Empath.
